attributes.action: Acknowledge responsibility for enforcement of Law & Civil Rights for the Republic of Cyprus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fact that the United Kingdom is part of Cyprus, namley, Akrotiri and Dhekelia which are UK Sovereign Base Areas in Cyprus. 
I therefore petition the United Kingdom to impose heavy economic and trade sanctions against Turkey and to encourage The international community, including the United Nations and United States, to follow suit.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
